profileText: a Representative from Kentucky; born in Louisville, Jefferson County, Ky., December 23, 1979; graduated from duPont Manual High School, Louisville, Ky., 1998; B.A., University of Missouri, Columbia, Missouri, 2002; J.D., University of Kentucky, Lexington, Kentucky, 2007; staff, United States Representative A. B. (Ben) Chandler of Kentucky, 2004; staff, Office of the Attorney General, State of Kentucky; lawyer, private practice; member of the Kentucky state senate, 2013-2023; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
